title: The Food Crisis Which Could Change Everything (Ep 1880)
description:
In this episode, I address a shocking story about the coming food crisis that could put our national security at risk. All while Biden is depleting our strategic oil reserves? and our weapons supplies. 

News Picks:


The lab leak theory has liberals melting down again. 


A troubling article about the coming food crisis. 

Critics explode on Biden over his ridiculous claims about the student loan welfare-bailout plan. 



Digital ID is moving fast, even here in the United States.

Despite Biden’s ridiculous claims, the federal deficit is exploding.



Biden is hurting our national security by depleting both our weapons supplies, and our emergency oil supplies.
